title: Sona Crashes game
body: Started game, sona was selected, game kept crashing upon startup.

replies.body: Same for me. I tried spectating a game with Sona and ever since then the game crashes just before playing. I TRIED fixing doing the repair. I even uninstalled and restalled the game. After several hours still nothing has worked. Can this issue ever be resolved?

Heyo, Helios Ex!

Were you spectating a game with Sona by chance? Or were you actually selecting Sona yourself in Champion Select and the game crashed after the Load Screen?

We are aware of a game-crashing bug right now concerning spectating a game with Sona in it, but if this is a different issue, getting your r3d logs from the game would be super duper helpful! (If you'd like to send em over, you can find your r3dlogs here: C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Logs\Game - R3d Logs)

Thanks!
Same for me , i ranked a game with a friend , sona was selected and the game has crashed. Now we can't reconnect
I wasn't spectating, enemy team had someone select Sona, and the game consistently crashed
